Class Nutrition

java.lang.Object
healthyBites.model.Nutrition
public class Nutrition extends Object
This class represents nutritional information. It stores a map of nutrient names and their corresponding values.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Nutrition()
    Default constructor that starts with an empty set of nutrients.
    Nutrition(Map<String,Double> nutrients)
    Constructor that takes a map of nutrients.

  • Method Details

    • getNutrientValue

      public double getNutrientValue(String nutrient)
      This method gives access to the value of a specific nutrient. If nutrient doesn't exist, returns 0.
      Parameters:
      nutrient - the name of the nutrient from csv file (e.g. PROTEIN)
      Returns:
      the amount of the specified nutrient

    • containsNutrient

      public boolean containsNutrient(String nutrient)
      Checks if the given nutrient is in the list.
      Parameters:
      nutrient - the name of the nutrient to check
      Returns:
      true if the nutrient exists, false otherwise

    • getNutrients

      public Map<String,Double> getNutrients()
      Returns a copy of all the nutrients.
      Returns:
      a map of all nutrient names and their values

    • add

      public Nutrition add(Nutrition other)
      Adds the nutrients from another Nutrition object and returns the result.
      Parameters:
      other - the other Nutrition object to add
      Returns:
      a new Nutrition object containing the sum of nutrients

    • multiplyBy

      public void multiplyBy(double factor)
      Multiplies all nutrient values by the given factor.
      Parameters:
      factor - the number to multiply each nutrient value by

    • dividedBy

      public void dividedBy(double factor)
      Divides all nutrient values by the given factor.
      Parameters:
      factor - the number to divide each nutrient value by
